Title.description: A compelling title for the historical documentary.

Summary.description: A brief summary of the documentary narrative.

MusicPrompt.description: A prompt to generate instrumental background music that fits the historical era and tone of the documentary.

Segments.description: An array of narrative segments for the documentary.

NarrationScript.description: The narration text to be read aloud by the narrator for this segment.

ImagePrompts.description: Image generation prompts for this segment. Each prompt creates one Ken Burns style image.

items.description: A detailed image generation prompt describing the scene, composition, lighting, and atmosphere.

HasTextOverlay.description: Whether this segment should display a text overlay. True when the narration mentions a specific date, time period, location, or historically important person.

TextOverlay.description: The text to display as an overlay. Examples: '1453 - Fall of Constantinople', 'Napoleon Bonaparte', 'Medieval Japan'. Empty string when HasTextOverlay is false.
